title: Unemployed persons worldwide until 2020
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Unemployed persons in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall Unemployed persons in millions has decreased over the Year.
Unemployed persons in millions is roughly constant from 2010 to 2016, gradually decreasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2020.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Unemployed persons in millions, about 201.3 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Unemployed persons in millions, of value 172.5 was reported at Year 2018
